title: (x) 1223 Spruce Street - Vogue (pre-digital) {Mark S}
content: There is an old metal face called Vogue that was almost certainly the basis for that. It has come up here [before](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110140257/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/30/13344.html).
author: Mark Simonson

comments.content: I've had my eye on Vogue for a long time. It's a lost treasure, in my opinion.
Oh, no! He's gone native! (Just kidding. You're welcome!)
